rules_text:
Whenever another artifact is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, put a charge counter on Big Bad Boom Barrel.
Sacrifice Big Bad Boom Barrel: Big Bad Boom Barrel deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of charge counters on it.
flavor_text: [i]The Mudhobble tribe changed forever when they discovered that more fuel resulted in a bigger explosion.[/i]
